snippet: The owner of a religious supplies store in Manhattan who is accused of sexually assaulting a teenage employee has now been charged with conspiring to kill him.
abstract: Daniel Miller, owner of a religious supply store in Manhattan who is accused of sexually assaulting a teenage employee, is arraigned on charges of conspiring to kill him to prevent him from testifying in the sexual assault case.
lead_paragraph: The owner of a religious supplies store in Manhattan who is accused of sexually assaulting a teenage employee has now been charged with conspiring to kill him.

headline.seo: Sex Assault Case on Long Island Now Includes Plot to Kill Boy
headline.main: Sex Assault Case Now Includes Plot to Kill Boy
headline.print_headline: Sex Assault Case Now Includes Plot to Kill Boy
